description: Grade 2 Coding - Scratch Basics with Loops and Events

project_templates.tagline: Make a ball that bounces forever!
project_templates.what_kids_build: A ball that bounces with repeat blocks

phase_1_rule_teaching.intro_hook: Watch this ball bounce! But I don't want to write 'bounce' 100 times. Let's use a loop with a NUMBER!

teaching_script.gigi_says: REPEAT with a number does something that exact number of times!
teaching_script.voice_text: Repeat 10 means do this 10 times. Change the number to bounce more or less!

rule_card.title: Repeat with Numbers
rule_card.rule: repeat (5) does something 5 times. Change the number to change how many!
rule_card.example: repeat (3): say Hi! ‚Üí Hi! Hi! Hi!

challenges.prompt: Make the ball bounce exactly 20 times then stop
challenges.answer: repeat (20): move, if on edge bounce

challenges.prompt: Change the move steps to make it faster

phase_6_complete.celebration: Your ball is bouncing perfectly! You control the loops!

project_templates.tagline: Create your own band with clickable instruments!
project_templates.what_kids_build: Multiple instruments that play when clicked
project_templates.why_exciting: Making music and sounds is engaging

phase_1_rule_teaching.intro_hook: Let's build a band! Click the drum - BOOM! Click the piano - ding! Each instrument has its OWN event!

teaching_script.gigi_says: Each sprite can have its own 'when clicked' event with different code!

data.note: Same event block, different sprites, different sounds!

challenges.prompt: When drum is clicked, play the drum sound
Add a guitar that plays when clicked

phase_6_complete.celebration: Your band is playing! Click to make music!

project_templates.tagline: Wave the wand and make things appear!
project_templates.what_kids_build: A wand that triggers magic effects
project_templates.why_exciting: Feeling like a wizard with magical powers

phase_1_rule_teaching.intro_hook: This magic wand can make things appear and disappear! But it only works IF you touch the right thing!

teaching_script.gigi_says: IF means 'when this is true, do something'. IF touching wand, appear!
teaching_script.voice_text: IF the star is touching the wand, it appears! Magic!

challenges.prompt: If the rabbit touches the wand, make it show

phase_6_complete.celebration: You're a coding wizard! Your magic wand works!

project_templates.tagline: Make all the animals dance together!

phase_1_rule_teaching.intro_hook: Let's make the animals DANCE! Animation means changing how they look really fast!

teaching_script.gigi_says: Animation is switching costumes fast! Cat pose 1, cat pose 2, cat pose 1, cat pose 2...
teaching_script.voice_text: Switch costumes in a loop! It looks like the cat is dancing!

challenges.prompt: Make the cat switch costumes in a forever loop

phase_6_complete.celebration: Your animals are dancing! Amazing animation!

project_templates.what_kids_build: A clickable story with characters talking
project_templates.why_exciting: Being an author of their own digital book

phase_1_rule_teaching.intro_hook: Let's write a story where YOU control what happens! Click to make characters talk!

teaching_script.gigi_says: Stories have a beginning, middle, and end. We can code each part!

blocks: say [Once upon a time...] for (3) seconds
say [A cat went on an adventure!] for (3) seconds

challenges.prompt: Make the cat say 'Hello! I'm going on an adventure!'
challenges.answer: say [Hello! I'm going on an adventure!] for (3) seconds

challenges.prompt: Add a dog that responds to the cat
challenges.answer: Dog sprite: when green flag clicked, wait (4) seconds, say [Can I come too?]

phase_6_complete.celebration: Your interactive story is complete! You're a digital author!
